医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
沙漠橄榄树珍珠可以缓解中老年人的认知问题研究调查了沙漠橄榄树珍珠 (DOTP) 对认知功能的显着影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Desert-olive-tree-pearls-may-allevate-cognitive-problems-in-middle-ages-and-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Desert-olive-tree-pearls-may-allevate-cognitive-problems-in-middle-ages-and-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82e337f1-dabf-4caa-9623-92ab3243f597 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 05:37:00 -0400 Desert olive tree pearls may alleviate cognitive problems in middle-aged and older adults
研究确定了影响骨骼形态的特定遗传变异，并将人类解剖学变化的主要进化方面与发病机制联系起来研究人员评估成像信息并表征骨骼比例，以评估这些特征的遗传根源及其相互之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Study-identizes-specific-genic-variants-that-affect-the-skeletal-form-and-ties-a-major-evolutionary-facet-of- human-anatomical-change-to-pathogenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Study-identizes-specific-genic-variants-that-affect-the-skeletal-form-and-ties-a-major-evolutionary-facet-of- human-anatomical-change-to-pathogenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d71ea6f-aca0-4621-8e34-99f4bec7818f Wed, 26 Jul 2023 05:12:00 -0400 Study identifies specific genetic variants that affect the skeletal form and ties a major evolutionary facet of human anatomical change to pathogenesis
正在开发的新型女性避孕药：网络调查显示最终用户的偏好研究人员调查了潜在最终用户对按需非激素女性避孕药的偏好。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/New-female-contraceptive-under-development-end-user-preferences-revealed-in-web-based-survey.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/New-female-contraceptive-under-development-end-user-preferences-revealed-in-web-based-survey.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b006c3a1-9814-42c7-88e7-6691613aa3c0 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 05:01:00 -0400 New female contraceptive under development: end-user preferences revealed in web-based survey

根据 CDC 的一项新研究，关节炎影响着 220,000 名儿童和青少年在美国疾病预防控制中心 (CDC) 最近发布的 MMWR 中，研究人员结合了 NSCH 在五年内收集的调查数据来估计关节炎的患病率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Arthritis-affects-220000-children-and-teens-according-to-a-new-CDC-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Arthritis-affects-220000-children-and-teens-according-to-a-new-CDC-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=495703a2-ef4b-491b-ba85-fd92ccffc6f3 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 04:56:00 -0400 Arthritis affects 220,000 children and teens, according to a new CDC study
有氧抗阻练习与认知训练和维生素 D 的多领域干预能否改善患有轻度认知障碍的老年人的认知？研究人员使用 SYNERGIC 试验来评估认知训练、渐进式锻炼和维生素 D 补充剂相结合对逆转成人轻度认知障碍影响的功效https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Does-a-multidomain-intervention-of-aerobic-resistance-exercises-with-cognitive-training-and-vitamin-D-improve-cognition-in-older-adults-with-mild-cognitive-impairment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Does-a-multidomain-intervention-of-aerobic-resistance-exercises-with-cognitive-training-and-vitamin-D-improve-cognition-in-older-adults-with-mild-cognitive-impairment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=59a90215-6957-4495-8e3f-7e43bd5ec559 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 04:30:00 -0400 Does a multidomain intervention of aerobic-resistance exercises with cognitive training and vitamin D improve cognition in older adults with mild cognitive impairment?
表观遗传变化能否解释年龄与癌症之间的密切联系？研究人员报告了衰老、癌症和表观基因组变化之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Can-epigenic-changes-explain-the-strong-link- Between-age-and-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Can-epigenic-changes-explain-the-strong-link- Between-age-and-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fdb13935-5b0d-4641-b390-04a4399f8d90 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 04:28:00 -0400 Can epigenetic changes explain the strong link between age and cancer?
